projects.name: Student Accommodation Service
projects.description: Creating an application to assist students in finding housing, depending on their likes and preferences. K-means clustering algorithm will be used to group together students/homeowners who have similar preferences, based on a questionnaire created utilizing the "OCEAN" big 5 personality traits dataset

projects.name: Generic Medicine App
projects.description: Developed an application in flutter that showcases 200+ branded medicines along with their generic counterparts to help users find generic medicines to their pricey branded medicine counterparts

projects.name: Wikipedia Chatbot
projects.description: created a chatbot that fetches information from wikipedia using verbal user input, users can save information if needed

projects.name: Stock Market Tracker
projects.description: built a react app that displays/compares stock data fetched using alpha vantage free API
